translations.ocr_confidence_desc: Lower values detect more text but may include false positives. Higher values are more strict but may miss some text.

translations.translation_offline_engines_note: ğŸ’¡ Offline Engines: These engines work without internet after models are downloaded. Models are downloaded automatically on first use.
translations.translation_internet_disclaimer: âš ï¸ Internet Connection Required: Cloud services need active internet connection. Translations are processed on remote servers. Free services have usage limits.
translations.translation_premium_disclaimer: ğŸ”‘ API Key Required: These services require a paid API key. Enter your API key below to enable. Higher quality and rate limits than free services.

translations.translation_lang_pairs_help: Select a language pair to download. Each model translates ONE direction (e.g., Englishâ†’German is different from Germanâ†’English). Models are ~300-500 MB each.
translations.translation_quality_desc: Higher quality provides better translations but may be slower. Fast mode is suitable for real-time translation.

translations.overlay_interactive_check: ğŸ¯ Make overlay interactive on mouse hover
translations.overlay_font_restart_note: âœ… All overlay settings take effect on next overlay display
translations.overlay_auto_contrast_desc: Automatically detect background color and adjust text/background colors for optimal contrast. Note: This feature is experimental and may impact performance.
translations.overlay_color_tip: ğŸ’¡ Tip: Use high contrast colors for better readability. White text on dark background or dark text on light background works best.
translations.overlay_transparency_desc:
0% = Fully transparent (invisible background)
100% = Fully opaque (solid background)
Recommended: 70-90% for good visibility without blocking content
translations.overlay_rounded_desc: Enable rounded corners for a modern, softer appearance. Disable for sharp, rectangular text boxes.
translations.overlay_positioning_desc_smart: Automatically positions overlay to avoid covering important content
translations.overlay_positioning_desc_above: Always displays translation above the detected text
translations.overlay_positioning_desc_below: Always displays translation below the detected text
translations.overlay_positioning_desc_fixed: Displays overlay at a fixed screen position
translations.overlay_animation_desc: Animations make the overlay appear smoothly. Shorter durations (200-400ms) feel snappier, longer durations (500-1000ms) feel smoother.
translations.overlay_timeout_desc: How long the overlay stays visible before automatically hiding. Set to 0 for permanent display (manual dismiss only).
translations.overlay_auto_hide_desc: Automatically hide translation overlays when the original text is no longer detected on screen. Useful for dynamic content like games or videos.
translations.overlay_interactive_desc:
When enabled: Hover over overlay to make it interactive (select/copy text).
When disabled: Overlay is always click-through (won't block mouse clicks).
translations.overlay_preview_desc: This preview shows how your overlay will appear with the current settings. Changes are applied in real-time.
